title: Council Directive 84/186/EEC of 26 March 1984 amending Directive 71/118/EEC on health problems affecting trade in fresh poultrymeat
header:
COUNCIL  DIRECTIVE
of 26 March 1984
amending Directive 71/118/EEC on health problems affecting trade in fresh poultrymeat
(84/186/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the last sentence of the first subparagraph of Article 14 (2) and in the third indent of Article 16a (a) of Directive 71/118/EEC the date '31 March 1984' is hereby replaced by '30 June 1984'.

Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive not later than 31 March 1984. They shall forthwith inform the Commission thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
